title: Continuous Cables: An Exploration of Knitted Cabled Knots, Rings, Swirls, and Curlicues
description: RANDOM HOUSE-Continuous Cables features step-by-step instructions on the general technique; 20 patterns; and more than 100 cable stitches for closed-ring cables. The detailed instructions make cable knitting accessible and easy to understand. This book also explains the often-daunting symbols knitters find on charts for knitted cables. Projects Simple Pillow; Simple Hat; Fireside Afghan; Stowe Cabin Throw Rug; Sage Tunic; Honeysuckle Sleeveless Shell; Baby Blocks; and more! 192 pages. Made in USA. "
author: Melissa Leapman
